skins.shipDescription: Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser C St. Louis, Hull Number CL-49!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm St. Louis, Helena's big sister. I got my nickname, Lucky Lou, from getting through the attack on Pearl Harbor unscathed. After that, however, my missions didn't go all that well. I guess luck really does come and go after all...
skins.acquisition: Hello, I'm St. Louis, but I'm called Lucky Lou. Hey, Commander, don't you think it's your lucky day, finding me like this?
skins.login: Luck never stays with one person for too long, Commander. We should make the best use of it while we still have it.
skins.details: Unlike those Sakura Empire ships, I don't bring any misfortune to my allies. Probably… I hope…
skins.secretaryIdle1: What are you looking at, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Helena, your SG radar can't detect underwater threats.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Arizona, even if you'll never forget what happened that day, you shouldn't let it wear you down so much.
skins.secretaryTouch: You get good luck if you touch me? I've never heard of that before.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This isn't something you should do outside, Co-man-der~

skins.shipDescription: What do you think of this foreign dress, Commander? *Giggle* ...Perhaps it's rekindled something within you?
skins.acquisition: What do you think of this foreign dress, Commander? *Giggle* ...Perhaps it's rekindled something within you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: How I wish I could bring this chair with me on sorties... Helena, could you help upgrade my rigging?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I am Lucky Lou. I may not look like it, but I actually have experience with fortune-telling.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Brr... It's actually a bit cold... Commander, could you come a little closer and... share your body heat with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh, do you mean I've put it on wrong? Have I really...?

skins.shipDescription: The Sakura Empire's clothes are just so refined. Ahaha... Aren't you cold standing out there, Commander? Sit down with me and have a drink.
skins.acquisition: The Sakura Empire's clothes are just so refined. Ahaha... Aren't you cold standing out there, Commander? Sit down with me and have a drink.
skins.login: You should drink a little something to warm yourself up before getting to work.
skins.secretaryIdle1: A "hatsumode," huh... Do you have any wishes to make, Commander? It so happens I don't, so you can have my wish.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Not to say the Eagle Union's new year celebrations are lonesome, but the Sakura Empire's and Eastern Radiance definitely celebrate New Year's with more festivity. And I like festivities.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Commander, if you're hoping to get me drunk... well, it depends on how much you yourself can drink. Ahahah~
skins.secretaryTouch: Are we heading out? Ahah, then let me get out my umbrella. Hey, come closer, otherwise you'll get snow on your clothes.

skins.shipDescription: Oh my, what a good little commander you've been, waiting here all this time for me. Hop in~ Did you think you would be driving? Hehe, you shouldn't underestimate me~
skins.login: The view here is lovely~ Let's pull over for a moment to take in the winds of good luck.
skins.details: Hehehe, you thought I'd drive in these high heels? It's certainly not impossible, but I'd rather use the other pair of shoes I have inside.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Oh dear, was that... Jamaica? Hehehe... Fasten your seatbelt, Commander. This'll be a bit of a wild ride.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You want to use my car? You can, of course, but promise me one thing in return: take Honolulu on a nice trip.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Whew... Finally we've arrived at the party. Now, Commander, wait here for thirty minutes while I reapply my makeup. Relax, I'm just joking! Hehehe~
skins.secretaryTouch: Let's see here... Ah, thanks, Commander. Hehehe, you're getting quite good at this.
